ygData.subject: I have the answers.
ygData.msgSnippet: Both skewers and scalers can be found in East Freeport.  They are in a store right around the corner from the armor shop.  I think it is called the travelers
ygData.messageBody:
Both skewers and scalers can be found in East Freeport. They are in a store
right around the corner from the armor shop. I think it is called the
travelers something. There are two doors. One has two people inside and
the other has a woman. The woman has all the molds you need to practice
with. As for the second question. There are no skill caps on trade skills.
I am level 14 and have an 86 is blacksmithing right now. If you have the
cash you can learn as long as you want.

Arden
Cazic-Thule
